learningLoop.title: The Learning Loop
learningLoop.subtitle: Understanding how your brain processes and retains information.

attention.title: Attention
attention.description: Filters sensory input and selects what enters working memory

workingMemory.title: Working Memory
workingMemory.description: Temporarily holds and processes selected info

encoding.title: Encoding
encoding.description: Transforms what is in the working memory into long-term memory

consolidation.title: Consolidation
consolidation.description: Reinforces and stabilizes long term memory traces over time

activeRecall.title: Active Recall
activeRecall.description: Actively retrieving information from memory rather than passively reviewing it.

interleaving.title: Interleaving
interleaving.description: Mixing different topics or problems within a single study session.

timingMatters.title: Why Timing Matters
timingMatters.subtitle: Spaced Repetition
timingMatters.description1: Reviewing information at increasing intervals over time.
timingMatters.description2: The forgetting curve shows how rapidly we lose information without reinforcement. Spaced repetition strategically times reviews just as you're about to forget, strengthening memory traces and dramatically improving retention.

deliberatePractice.title: Deliberate Practice
deliberatePractice.description: Focused practice on specific areas of weakness with immediate feedback.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy: Learn by Doing
philosophy.point1: At Taalam, we believe in learning through action. Our approach is simple but powerful: Start a block, answer a question, read the explanation, and move on. This cycle helps you learn faster – and more importantly, retain what you've learned.
philosophy.point2: Every question is designed to teach, not just test. We focus on the core concepts most commonly seen on the Qudurat exam, so your effort goes where it matters most.
philosophy.point3: Our platform also uses spaced repetition algorithms to automatically revisit key concepts just before you forget them – improving retention and making sure knowledge sticks.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: We are a team of passionate educators, lifelong learners, and innovative technologists. Our focus is to empower students in Saudi Arabia with smarter ways to prepare for their studies. We specialize in high-stakes exams like Qudurat, where the right preparation can change futures. By blending proven learning science with modern technology, we make studying more effective and engaging. At Taalam, we believe every student deserves the opportunity to learn smarter and achieve their goals.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: At Taalam, we're on a mission to change how students learn—by turning learning into a skill rooted in science. In a world where adaptability is everything, we help students master how to learn faster, better, and with purpose.

features.feature1: We focus on evidence-based learning strategies
features.feature2: Built specifically for the Saudi student experience
features.feature3: Designed to help you study smarter, not longer
features.feature4: We don't just give you content — we train you to learn

whyWeStarted.title: Why We Started Taalam
whyWeStarted.subtitle: Our Story
whyWeStarted.description: Taalam was born from a simple yet powerful observation: traditional education wasn't meeting the diverse needs of modern students. Our founders, experienced educators and technologists, witnessed countless bright minds struggling not because they lacked ability, but because they weren't learning in ways that worked for them. In 2020, during a time when education was being reimagined globally, we decided to take action. We started with a vision: to create an educational platform that truly understands each student as an individual. Through extensive research, collaboration with educators, and countless hours of development, Taalam emerged as a comprehensive solution. Today, we're proud to serve thousands of students, helping them discover their potential and achieve their academic goals. Our journey is just beginning, and we remain committed to evolving and improving to better serve the next generation of learners.
